ygData.subject: Re: Black sash
ygData.msgSnippet: if you can kill a guildmaster I wouls suggest going t camp the flowing black silk sash. it has no stats tho. but oh yes it does have that haste effect thing.
ygData.messageBody:
if you can kill a guildmaster I wouls suggest going t camp the flowing black
silk sash. it has no stats tho. but oh yes it does have that haste effect
thing. seriously this sash is worht the camp no matter how long it takes.

Kizmet Bayashi
40th level monk
Da`Kor
E-marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Burkhardt <jburkhar@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 12:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Black sash


> From: "Jason Burkhardt" <jburkhar@...>
>
> Yes, Puab Klosk(sp?) drops it. Its more or less junk, biggest stat
> increases are +3 to agi/dex, definately not worth killing a lvl 50
> guildmaster.
> Jason
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Brad Reppen <breppen@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 3:10 AM
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Black sash
>
>
> > From: "Brad Reppen" <breppen@...>
> >
> > I had heard that the black sash was a drop from the Master of the Ashen
> Order.
> >
> > Has anyone else heard that? What does the sash do, and what type of
> faction
> > crash does it involve?
> >
> > What would you do if you saw someone wearing the sash from your order?
> >
> > Lengard
> > 10th level Monk
> > Yellow Sash-Ashen Order
> > Solusek Ro
> >
> > >
>
> >
